alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Morrow; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued April 01 at 11:49AM EDT until April 01 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN RICHLAND...SOUTHERN ASHLAND...NORTHEASTERN MORROW... SOUTHWESTERN WAYNE AND NORTHERN HOLMES COUNTIES... At 1146 AM EDT, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Shreve to near Hayesville to near Galion, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility and heavy snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This snow squall will impact Interstate 71, US Highway 30, US Highway 42, and Ohio State Route 83. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wooster, Ontario, Lexington, Loudonville, Bellville, Shreve, Hayesville, Holmesville, Nashville, Waterford, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Jeromesville, Fredericksburg, Mifflin, Mohicanville, Mount Hope and Reedsburg. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
